data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cervantes, Gabriela, Fragoso, Carlos (2018): Protozapotecia acaxetlensis and Protozapotecia oyametlensis, two new earthworm species (Crassiclitellata: Acanthodrilidae) from Mexican central mountains. Zootaxa 4496 (1): 431-439, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4496.1.32|1 occurrence
